name: Riot !!
description:
Try to overthrow the government. If one peasant like you can't do anything, hundred of peasant can.

Brackeys Gamejam 2021 : Stronger Together

How to play:
Place different unit on the ground to defeat the city hall. The "money" of the game is the manpower you have. Select the unit you want on the right and place it on the ground. You have access to three different units:
-  The peasant, the most basic unit. He targets the nearest buildings and punch it.
- The bomber runs to the city hall and if he encounter an ennemi attack it and explode.
- The trebuchet, multiple peasant help each other to propulse other unit in the air.

Controls:
camera movement : wasd - zqsd - ↑←↓ →
